snippet: Top state lawmakers are taking another look at an underutilized scholarship program meant for students in poorly performing schools who want to transfer.
lead_paragraph: Top state lawmakers are taking another look at an underutilized scholarship program meant for students in poorly performing schools who want to transfer.

headline.seo: Powerful State Lawmakers Push for a New Public-School Scholarship Program
headline.main: Powerful State Lawmakers Push for a New Public-School Scholarship Program
headline.print_headline: Powerful State Lawmakers Push for a New Public-School Scholarship Program
